patterns: please provide sports and games information
responses: GEC Palakkad encourages all-round development of students and hence provides sports facilities in the campus. Collage has a huge ground situated behind the building. Also has facilities like badminton court, volltyball court and basket ball court. varous sports competitionS including intercollege sports competition are conducted during every academic year.
The active student communities in Gec Palakkad are IEEE, IEDC, NSS, FOSS CLUB, THINKER HUB

patterns: is mobile phone allowed inside the campus
